name: Save the rainforest
description:
A long, long time ago, Ezili - the goddess of water, beauty and love - was revered by the tribes of the rainforest. For thousands of generations the shamen have taken the spirit journey to her river kingdom, whenever there was a shortage of fish or game. They would come to her to clean her hair, as tribute for her releasing more fish into the river.

Nowadays the rivers are filled with waste like plastic, and that is making Ezili angry.
